means: 再形成，再组成( re-form的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The re - formed scout troop has been very active.
sentence.Network_cn: 改编的侦察队非常有行动力.

sentence.Network_en: Ice re - formed on the plane's wings.

sentence.Network_en: Our combined fleet has recently re - formed.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 根据Porter（1980）的界定，新兴产业为「新建立的或是重新型塑（re-formed）的产业，它的出现原因包括科技创新、相对成本结构的改变、新的顾客需求，或是因为经济与社会上的改变使得某.

list.abs: judicatory justice and judicatory efficiency are the two value objectives pursued in our judicatory re-form .司法公正与司法效率是我国司法改革追求的两大价值目标。

the article is about how to adapt air hammer to perform local upsetting operation . the project design of technology , equipment re form and die design etc has been clearly illustrated in the artide .讨论了利用空气锤完成局部顶镦的工艺方案设计、设备改造与模具设计等。

re-use of forms 模板重复使用

entry.def: When an organization, group, or shape re-forms, or when someone re-forms it, it is created again after a period during which it did not exist or existed in a different form.

example.ex: The official trades union council voted to disband itself and re-form as a confederation...
example.tran: 这个官方的工会委员会投票决定解体然后重新组成联盟。
这个40岁的歌手重组了他的乐队。

sentences.sentence: "the re-formed scout troop has been very active"
